text: Shadows of Tombstone is a 1953 American western film directed by William Witney and starring Rex Allen, Jeanne Cooper and Slim Pickens.Drew p.624 The film's art direction was by Frank Hotaling. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * Bernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide. title: Shadows of Tombstone
